titleInfo.title: Side, Bottom Coffin of High Priest Masaharta

mods.abstract: Bottom side panel of coffin of High Priest Masaharta at the Gizeh Museum; four painted male figures in three quarter view wearing nemes crowns and image of Nut as the sky framed by columns of hieroglyphs and horizontal stripes on the coffin of the Masaharta, High Priest of Amun in Thebes, ca. 1054-1045 B.C.E.; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
